chapter.text: Frustration fills your body. ^1500Where did the door go. ^1500The exit was here yesterday. ^1500You begin to breathe heavy. ^1500You’ve run through the whole school. ^1500 This can’t be the only way out. ^1500You run down the hall opening trying every classroom door along the way. ^1500Locked. ^1500Locked. ^1500Locked.
